comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Margaret Rutherfurd, step daughter of William Kissam Vanderbilt, and wife of Ogden Livingston Mills, Jr. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ogden_L._Mills The artist is François Flameng (1856-1923)

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT SOCIETY PORTRAITS BY MODERN MASTERS ON EXHIBITION February 16, 1913, Sunday query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9902E0D81539E632A... a portrait of Mrs. Ogden Mills by Flameng was on show in New York in February 1913. "SOCIETY is to enjoy a novel diversion this week in the exhibition of women's portraits by modern masters, which is to be given under the management of Mrs. Philip M. Lydig at the Glaezner Galleries, 705 Fifth Avenue, beginning on Thursday afternoon and continuing until Sunday, Feb. 23, inclusive....

comment._content: Yup, definitely Ruth Livingston Mills.  I just saw this painting,,,it's still on display at the Mills Mansion in Staatsburg;-)
